levels.title: Why IoT Security is Different
cards: Unlike computers or phones, many smart devices don't support strong antivirus tools.
They are small, cheap, and often forgotten after setup — which makes them easy targets.
You might not even notice when one of them is hacked, since most of them don't have screens or alerts.
Once inside your smart device, an attacker can use it to spy, steal info, or jump to other devices in your home.
That’s why securing IoT requires different habits and tools than regular cybersecurity.

questions.question: Why is IoT security harder than regular computer security?
options: They don’t support standard antivirus software

questions.question: What’s one danger of hacked IoT devices?
options: They can spy or spread malware to other devices

levels.title: Default Settings Are Dangerous
cards: When you first install a smart device, it often comes with a default username and password — like 'admin' and '1234'.
Attackers know these defaults and use them to get in fast — without hacking.
Many people never change these settings after setup, especially if the device 'just works'.
Some devices also leave risky features enabled, like remote access, which can be exploited.
Always change the password and disable anything you don't need!

questions.question: What’s the risk of keeping default passwords on smart devices?
options: Attackers can guess them easily and gain control

questions.question: Which feature should be disabled if not needed?

levels.title: IoT Network Segmentation
cards: You can create a separate network for your smart devices — often called a guest network.
That way, even if one device is hacked, the attacker can't reach your phone or computer.
It’s like putting the risky devices in their own digital sandbox.
Some routers let you do this by creating two Wi-Fi names (SSIDs), or using advanced settings like VLANs.
It’s one of the best ways to limit damage if something goes wrong.

questions.question: What does network segmentation help with?
options: Separating smart devices from sensitive ones
